ESP.ORIGINAL: All your worldbuilding needs in one file.

scn REPCONSabotageTerminalScript
int Button int ScreenNumber ; 0 = Main Menu (normal), 1 = Screen with just an "OK" button, 2 = Fix Trajectory Menu, 3 = Dumb Menu int ChangeMade int MashCounter
begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1 if ChangeMade == 0 if Player.GetActorValue Intelligence < 4 ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalDumb1Msg Set ScreenNumber to 3 elseif Player.GetActorValue Science >= 55 ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalMessage else ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalAvgMsg Set ScreenNumber to 1 endif else ShowMessage REPCONSabotageDoneTerminalMessage endif endif
end ; OnActivate
begin GameMode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ChangeMade == 1 && Button == 0 Return endif
if ScreenNumber == 0 ; At this level, show the main menu
if Button == 0 ; Examine further ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalSuperHighIntMsg Set ScreenNumber to 2
elseif Button == 1 ; Sabotage ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalCrashMsg RewardXP 55 RewardKarma -50 Set ChangeMade to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 90 1 ; Complete Sabotage Objective Set ScreenNumber to 1 ; Next box just has an OK button endif
elseif ScreenNumber == 1 ; This level is for those prompts with a default "OK" button
if Button == 0 Set ScreenNumber to 0 ; You hit the OK button, reset so main menu appears next use endif
elseif ScreenNumber == 2 ; This level is for showing the two "Fix the trajectory" options
if Button == 0 ; Fix trajectory ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalImprovedPathMsg RewardXP 55 RewardKarma 50 Set ChangeMade to 1 Set ScreenNumber to 1 set TLDQuest.RepconnCourseCorrectTLD to 1 elseif Button == 1 ; Do nothing Set ScreenNumber to 0 endif
elseif ScreenNumber == 3 ; Dumb terminal, can only mash on keys
if Button == 0 if MashCounter >= 4 PlaySound OBJForceFieldShutdown ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalDumbBrokenMsg Set ChangeMade to 1 RewardKarma -50 else ShowMessage REPCONSabotageTerminalDumb2Msg endif
Set MashCounter to MashCounter + 1 Set ScreenNumber to 1 ; Next box just has an OK button elseif Button == 1 Set ScreenNumber to 0 endif endif
end ; GameMode

scn TLDFPGEQuestScript
;This unified script handles (most of) TLD's FPGE-exclusive content and related reactivity.
Int NCRVictoryConsequences Int LegionVictoryConsequences Int HouseVictoryConsequences int IndependentVictoryConsequences
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN GameMode
IF VStoryState < 60 ;For when the script is running but the player hasn't ended the game yet Return ENDIF
IF VStoryState == 61 ;NCR Victory ;print "NCR victory." If NCRVictoryConsequences == 0
;Fiends: The Fiends are wiped out in any scenario TLDFiendBossREF.Enable
;Followers if VFSJulieFarkasREF.GetDead == 0 if VStoryEventFollowersSupport == 0 UnderpassDisabler.Disable endif endif
;Faction hitsquad cleanup TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.disable TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.markfordelete BoSAssassinsRef.disable BoSAssassinsRef.markfordelete
;Jacobstown: the Supermutants scatter if Marcus is dead. if eval VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead && TLDJacobstownPatrol.getdisabled == 0 TLDJacobstownPatrol.Disable endif
;Khans: One way or another, the Khans will dissappear from the game PGGKAllianceMarker.Disable KhansWipedOut.Disable KhanWestSideRef.disable TLDKhanChemPusherLong.disable KhanPusher1.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel KhanPusher1.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1
;Legion: NCR won, thus disabling all pre-battle Legion presence. Adding some Legion martyrs in addition to that. LegionWastelandMarker.Disable CottonwoodMarker.Disable LegionMQ3.Disable LegionMQ2.Disable MQ1Legion.Disable TLDLegionStage1Explorer.Disable CharlieMarker.Disable NelsonDead.Enable ForlornHopeDead.Disable TLDLegionGasStationAttackTriggerRef.Disable TLDLegionMartyrs.Enable
;NCR patrols and post game events TLDNCRPostWarRef1.Enable TLDNCRPostWarRef2.Enable TLDNCRPostWarRef3.Enable TLDNCRPostWarRef4.Enable TLDFiendsPostGameLastStance.enable NCRFiendCleanUpTriggerRef.enable TLDSharecropperBarricades.enable
;Novac if GetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 100
else TLDRepconnRads.disable ;since FPGE will irradiate the area too depending on the quest outcome. NovacDeadMarker.Disable TLDNovacProspectorTrader.Disable TLDNovacProspectorsMarker.Disable TLDRepconnGhoulCaptiveREF.disable endif
;Powder Gang: the Powder Gang is wiped out in any NCR scneario PowderGangDeathMarker.Disable TLDNCRprisonPatrol.Enable GStakenOver.Disable PowderGangPatrol2ref.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable Vault19Marker.disable
;Raiders: the presence of other raiders is decreased as well since the army can tend to other threats RaiderWastelandPresenceMarker.Disable TLDEldoradoBanditDisabler.Enable
;Disables Securitrons MKIIUpdate.Disable TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.Enable TLDSecuritronReplaceMentClarkField.enable TLDProspectorPlatinumReplacementRef.disable
;V19 Vault19Marker.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable
Set NCRVictoryConsequences to 1 stopquest TLDFPGEQuest Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ELSEIF VStoryState == 62 ;Legion Victory If LegionVictoryConsequences == 0 ;print "Legion victory" ;Boomers BoomerExplorerRef.Disable
;Faction hitsquad cleanup TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.disable TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.markfordelete BoSAssassinsRef.disable BoSAssassinsRef.markfordelete
;Fiends: Fokin DED TLDLegionFiendFinisherRef.enable
;Followers: Underpass. UnderpassDisabler.Disable
;Goodsprings: the vast majority of the town's population make a run for it. Also disables Powder Gangers. GSTraderRef.Disable TLDCustomerMarker.Disable GStakenOver.Disable
;Jacobstown: the Supermutants scatter if Marcus is dead. if eval VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead && TLDJacobstownPatrol.getdisabled == 0 TLDJacobstownPatrol.Disable endif
;Khans: One way or another, the Khans will disappear from the game PGGKAllianceMarker.Disable KhansWipedOut.Disable KhanWestSideRef.kill TLDKhanChemPusherLong.disable KhanPusher1.addscriptpackage TLDgameoverTravel KhanPusher1.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1
;Legion: Spawns additional Legion content and patrols when Legion won the game TLDLegionPostWarRef1.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef2.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef3.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef4.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef5.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef6.Enable TLDLegionPostWarRef7.Enable
;NCR Civilians and NCR Troops CharlieMarker.Enable Patrol5REF.Disable NCRWastelandGeneral.Disable McCarranMarker.Disable MQ1NCR.Disable MQ2NCR.Disable MQ3NCR.Disable NelsonDead.Disable TLDLegionGasStationAttackTriggerRef.Disable ForlornHopeDead.Disable TLDNCRprisonPatrol.Disable TLDNCRScout1Ref.Disable TLDFoxtrottAmbushMarker.Disable TLDv19NCRexplorer.addscriptpackage TLDgameoverTravel TLDv19NCRexplorer.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 MOP2LeaderRef.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel MOP2LeaderRef.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 SWranger.Disable TLDRoguesAndDesertersRef.Enable TLDNCRLostDesertersRef.Enable TLDNCRPostLegionPresence.Enable TLDNCRPostLegionPresence.AddItem TLDNCRMercOrders 1 TLDGunRunnerCaravan.Disable TLDFiendMercPatrol.Disable TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.disable TLDSecuritronReplaceMentClarkField.disable SWranger.disable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable
if GetStageDone VES34Vault 80 TLDShareCropperMarker.disable elseif TLDShareCropperMarker.getdisabled == 0 TLDLegionFarmers.Enable TLDSharecropperBarricades.Enable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable SetCellOwnership SharecropperBarracks01 VCaesarsLegionFaction endif
;Novac NovacDeadMarker.disable TLDNovacProspectorTrader.disable TLDNovacProspectorsMarker.disable TLDRepconnGhoulCaptiveREF.disable
if GetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 100
else TLDRepconnRads.disable ;since FPGE will irradiate the area too depending on the quest outcome. endif
;Powder Gang is wiped out completly. NCR patrol that usually strolls around the area after Eddie's death is of course also disabled. PowderGangDeathMarker.Disable GStakenOver.Disable PowderGangPatrol2ref.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable Vault19Marker.disable
;Primm NCRPrimm.Disable
;Raiders: other raiders decreased in numbers as the Legion erradicates all threats with no mercy. RaiderWastelandPresenceMarker.Disable TLDEldoradoBanditDisabler.Enable
;Securitrons MKIIUpdate.Disable
;Tourists, etc. WastelanderMarker.Disable MOCleared.Disable QJCleared.Disable NorthWestRouteDisabler.Disable TLDGunRunnerCaravan.Disable TLDMercSpawn.Disable TLDProspectorPlatinumReplacementRef.disable TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.disable TLDSecuritronReplaceMentClarkField.disable
;Westside and Outer Vegas WestsideMarker.disable MarkRestStopRef.kill HarryStage1.disable HarryStage2.disable TLDHarryStoreTriggerRef.disable
;V19 Vault19Marker.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable
Set LegionVictoryConsequences to 1 stopquest TLDFPGEQuest Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ELSEIF VStoryState == 63 ;House victory If HouseVictoryConsequences == 0 ;print "House victory"
TLDVegasEndingRef1.Enable TLDVegasEndingRef2.Enable TLDVegasEndingRef3.Enable
;BoS if VStoryEventBoS != 2 ;Compatibility option for House-Brotherhood Truce mods. Does nothing without one of those. BoSHardin.enable TLDBosOutpost.enable TLDBosOutpostPersonell.enable endif
;Fiends: The Securitrons make short work of them. All handled in TLDQuest.
;Faction hitsquad cleanup TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.disable TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.markfordelete BoSAssassinsRef.disable BoSAssassinsRef.markfordelete
;Jacobstown: the Supermutants scatter if Marcus is dead. if eval VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead && TLDJacobstownPatrol.getdisabled == 0 TLDJacobstownPatrol.Disable endif
;Khans: One way or another, the Khans will disappear from the game PGGKAllianceMarker.Disable KhansWipedOut.Disable KhanWestSideRef.disable TLDKhanChemPusherLong.disable KhanPusher1.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel KhanPusher1.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1
;Legion Troops LegionWastelandMarker.Disable CottonwoodMarker.Disable LegionMQ3.Disable LegionMQ2.Disable MQ1Legion.Disable TLDLegionStage1Explorer.Disable CharlieMarker.Disable ForlornHopeDead.Disable TLDLegionMartyrs.Enable
;NCR Civilians and NCR Troops NCRWastelandGeneral.Disable McCarranMarker.Disable MQ1NCR.Disable MQ2NCR.Disable MQ3NCR.Disable NelsonDead.Disable ForlornHopeDead.Disable Patrol5REF.Disable TLDNCRprisonPatrol.Disable TLDNCRScout1Ref.Disable TLDFoxtrottAmbushMarker.Disable TLDv19NCRexplorer.addscriptpackage TLDgameoverTravel TLDv19NCRexplorer.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 MOP2LeaderRef.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel MOP2LeaderRef.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 SWranger.Disable TLDLegionGasStationAttackTriggerRef.Disable TLDNCRLostDesertersRef.Enable TLDFiendMercPatrol.Disable SWranger.disable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable NCRPrimm.Disable
if GetStageDone VES34Vault 80 TLDShareCropperMarker.disable
elseif TLDShareCropperMarker.getdisabled == 0
TLDHouseFarmers.Enable TLDSharecropperBarricades.Enable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable TLDShareCropperMarker.disable SetCellOwnership SharecropperBarracks01 TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction
endif
;Novac if GetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 100
else TLDRepconnRads.disable ;since FPGE will irradiate the area too depending on the quest outcome. NovacDeadMarker.Disable TLDNovacProspectorTrader.Disable TLDNovacProspectorsMarker.Disable TLDRepconnGhoulCaptiveREF.disable endif
set HouseVictoryConsequences to 1 stopquest TLDFPGEQuest Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ELSEIF VStoryState >= 64 ;Independent Victory ;print "Independent Victory"
TLDVegasEndingRef1.Enable TLDVegasEndingRef2.Enable TLDVegasEndingRef3.Enable
IF IndependentVictoryConsequences == 0
;Faction hitsquad cleanup TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.disable TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.markfordelete BoSAssassinsRef.disable BoSAssassinsRef.markfordelete
;Jacobstown: the Supermutants scatter if Marcus is dead. if eval VDialogueJacobstown.bMarcusDead && TLDJacobstownPatrol.getdisabled == 0 TLDJacobstownPatrol.Disable endif
;Khans: One way or another, the Khans will disappear from the game PGGKAllianceMarker.Disable KhansWipedOut.Disable KhanWestSideRef.disable TLDKhanChemPusherLong.disable KhanPusher1.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel KhanPusher1.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1
;Legion Troops LegionWastelandMarker.Disable CottonwoodMarker.Disable LegionMQ3.Disable LegionMQ2.Disable TLDLegionStage1Explorer.Disable MQ1Legion.Disable CharlieMarker.Disable ForlornHopeDead.Disable TLDLegionMartyrs.Enable
;NCR Civilians and NCR Troops NCRWastelandGeneral.Disable McCarranMarker.Disable MQ1NCR.Disable MQ2NCR.Disable MQ3NCR.Disable NelsonDead.Disable ForlornHopeDead.Disable Patrol5REF.Disable TLDNCRprisonPatrol.Disable TLDNCRScout1Ref.Disable TLDFoxtrottAmbushMarker.Disable TLDv19NCRexplorer.addscriptpackage TLDgameoverTravel TLDv19NCRexplorer.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 MOP2LeaderRef.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel MOP2LeaderRef.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 SWranger.Disable TLDLegionGasStationAttackTriggerRef.Disable TLDNCRLostDesertersRef.Enable TLDFiendMercPatrol.Disable TLDSecuritronReplaceMentClarkField.disable TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.disable SWranger.disable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable NCRPrimm.Disable
If GetStageDone VES34Vault 80 TLDShareCropperMarker.disable
elseif TLDShareCropperMarker.getdisabled == 0 TLDIndependenceFarmers.enable TLDSharecropperCaravan.Disable SetCellOwnership SharecropperBarracks01 FollowersOfTheApocalypseFaction endif Endif
If GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 > 4 if TLDRoguesAndDesertersRef.getdisabled TLDRoguesAndDesertersRef.Enable endif Endif
;Novac if GetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 100
else TLDRepconnRads.disable ;since FPGE will irradiate the area too depending on the quest outcome. NovacDeadMarker.Disable TLDNovacProspectorTrader.Disable TLDNovacProspectorsMarker.Disable TLDRepconnGhoulCaptiveREF.disable endif
set IndependentVictoryConsequences to 1 stopquest TLDFPGEQuest ENDIF
END

SCN TLDHitsquadFollowerScript
BEGIN OnLoad
If IsInInterior MoveToEditorPosition Endif END

scn TLDQuestscript
;This quest controls the disabling and enabling of various npcs and events across the Mojave, as well as faction relations and changes of cell ownership.
;INI Variables
int IniTLD
int HitsquadDisabledVar int HitsquadRespawnVar int JacksonQuestSkipvar int LessNPCsVar int MojavesMostWantedvar int TunnelersVar int UnderpassDisablerVar int WestsideVar int YaoGuaiVar
int iMojaveNPCs ;Checks if installed to prevent some conflicts. int iGlobalsValue
;Quest variables
int BoomerTLD int BMTLD int BosConTLD int BoSDead int BosLockdown int BoSProcurement int BoSProTLD int CharlieTLD int CottonwoodTLD int CounterFeiterTLD int FiendsTLD int ForlornTLD int GoodspringsTLD Int HarryState ;0= Regular, 1= Van Graff Knockoff 2= Dead, aka. Junkie Den (currently unimplemented), 3= Wild Wasteland (currently unimplemented) int KhansTLD int KhansMeds int KhansDestroyedTLD int Level8TLD int LRNukedNCR int MojaveOutpostTLD int MQ1TLD int MQ2TLD int MQ3TLD int NelsonTLD int NovacTLD int PowderGangTLD int PrimmNCRTLD int PrimmTLD int RepconnCourseCorrectTLD ;checks if player correcter rockets' course, preventing crash landing event from happening. int SecuritronsTLD
int SloanTLD int TunnelersTLD int V19TLD int V34TLD int V22TLD
int BrightFollowerCaptiveState ;0= captive 1= on the run
BEGIN GameMode
;INI functions
IF GetGameRestarted
if IsModLoaded "Mojave NPCs.esm" iMojaveNPCs := 1 else iMojaveNPCs := 0 endif
set IniTLD to 0 set HitsquadDisabledVar to GetINIFloat "General:iHitsquadsDisabled" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set HitsquadRespawnVar to GetINIFloat "General:iHitsquadsRespawn" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set JacksonQuestSkipvar to GetINIFloat "General:iIcantFindItInMyHeart" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set LessNPCsVar to GetINIFloat "General:iLessCivilians" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" ;set MojavesMostWantedvar to GetINIFloat "General:iMojavesMostWanted" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" Currently unimplemented set TunnelersVar to GetINIFloat "General:iNoTunnelers" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set UnderpassDisablerVar to GetINIFloat "General:iUnderpassDisabler" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set WestsideVar to GetINIFloat "General:iWestsidePopulationBoost" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini" set YaoGuaiVar to GetINIFloat "General:iNoYaoGuais" "LivingDesert\Settings.ini"
If IniTLD == 0 if UnderpassDisablerVar ;gets rid of Underpass & ownership changes, re-enables the psychotic man-eating cows Obsidian put there as a desperate excuse for the lack of real content. ;SetCellFlag UnderpassRanchInterior01 5 0 - currently disabled due to bugginess. UnderpassDisabler.disable SetCellOwnership UnderpassRanchInterior01 elseif UnderpassDisablerVar == 0 if UnderpassDisabler.getdisabled SetCellOwnership UnderpassRanchInterior01 FollowersOfTheApocalypseFaction endif endif set IniTLD to 1 Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Map Marker rep reactivity. Needs to be re-applied on every game restart since JIP functions apparently aren't persistent. Original script kindly provided by AVeryUncreativeUsername, aka Trooper.
If SatoREF.getdead ;Removes BoS rep from BoS safehouse if Sato is dead. Removed duplicate marker I was using for this precise purpose, since scripting is cleaner for these purposes. BrotherhoodSafehouseMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep BrotherhoodSafehouseMapMarker.SetMapMarkerName "Abandoned Brotherhood Safehouse" Endif
If vStoryEventNelson == 1 EldoradoGasAndServiceMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVNCR Endif
; If Brotherhood wiped out and checkpoint set up, change name and reputation.
If eval VStoryEventBoS == 2 && BoSCheckpointRef.GetMapMarkerRep != RepNVPowderGanger BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVPowderGanger BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerName "Plasma Ganger Checkpoint" Endif
; If Plasma Gangers are taken out then remove rep and rename checkpoint.
If GetDeadCount TLDPlasmaGanger >= 4 BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerRep BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerName "Abandoned Brotherhood Checkpoint" Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; FPGE ;Compatibility; check if FPGE is installed/has been uninstalled
If IsModLoaded "Functional Post Game Ending.esm" ;Checks if FPGE is even loaded if GetQuestRunning TLDFPGEQuest == 0 startquest TLDFPGEQuest ;print "starting FPGE quest"
;FPGE-related Map marker reactivity, see explanation in previous block if VStoryState == 63 SharecropperFarmsMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVTheStrip ;Change map marker Rep to Mr. House Endif
; If the Courier and Yes Man take over and Julie isn't dead then set reputation to Followers. if VStoryState >= 64 if VFSJulieFarkasREF.GetDead == 0 SharecropperFarmsMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVFollowers endif endif
; If NCR takes over and Julie isn't dead then remove the reputation if VStoryState == 61 if eval VStoryEventFollowersSupport != 1 && VFSJulieFarkasREF.GetDead == 0 UnderpassMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep endif endIf
; If Julie is dead then remove reputation in all endings. if VStoryState >= 61 if VFSJulieFarkasREF.GetDead UnderpassMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep endif endif
; If Legion takes over then remove reputation. if VStoryState == 62 UnderpassMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep endif
; General Legion changes if VStoryState == 62 BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerRep BoSCheckpointRef.SetMapMarkerName "Abandoned Brotherhood Checkpoint" EldoradoGasAndServiceMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVCaesarsLegion endif
; Remove reputation in House and Yes Man endings. if VStoryState >= 63 EldoradoGasAndServiceMapMarker.SetMapMarkerRep endif
endif
else if GetQuestrunning TLDFPGEQuest StopQuest TLDFPGEQuest ;print "stopping FPGE quest" endif Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Sets faction relations and cell ownership without needing to edit base game records.
If GetFactionCombatReaction WestsideFactionNV TLDWestsideFriends != 2 SetAlly TLDWastelandCustomerFaction NovacGenericTownie 1 1 SetAlly WestsideFactionNV TLDWestSideFriends 0 0 SetAlly TLDLegionSlaveFaction VCaesarsLegionFaction 1 1 SetEnemy PowderGangerFactionNV 188GeneralFaction 0 0 SetEnemy PowderGangerFactionNV vMojaveCivilianFaction 0 0 SetEnemy PowderGangerFactionNV TLDAssassinfaction 0 0 SetEnemy VCaesarsLegionFaction TLDAssassinfaction 0 0 TLDsquatter1.addtofaction TLDBrahminFriends 1 TLDsquatter2.addtofaction TLDBrahminFriends 1 TLDsquatter3.addtofaction TLDBrahminFriends 1 ;ShowMessage TLDInitializedMessage Endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Set Globals to their initial value
If iGlobalsValue == 0 SetGlobalValue TLDCombatArmorVar 100 SetGlobalValue TLDNCRPowerArmorVar 0 SetGlobalValue TLDKhanChemVar 100 iGlobalsValue := 1 Endif
If GetStageDone VMQHouse5 110 ;In case players are using some House-BoS alliance mod. Not really relevant otherwise, since the BoS would be gone at this point. if GetFactionCombatReaction TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction TLDBoSFaction SetEnemy TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction TLDBoSFaction 1 1 endif Endif
If getobjectivecompleted VMQYesMan02 102 ;If player chooses to ignore BoS if GetFactionCombatReaction TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction TLDBoSFaction != 3 setAlly TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction TLDBoSFaction 1 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Quest and decision-related stuff. Ordered alphabetically, see vars above.
;Boomer Stuff
If getstagedone vms15 110 ;Volare completed if BoomerTLD == 0 BoomerExplorerRef.Enable TLDProspectorMerchantBoomerReplaced.Disable set BoomerTLD to 1 endif Endif
If eval (VStoryEventBoomers == 2 || VStoryEventBoomers == 0 || getquestcompleted vms15 && vms15.LeaderDied) ;Boomers wiped out if BoomerExplorerRef.getdisabled == 0 BoomerExplorerRef.Disable endif Endif
;Black Mountain: Disables the Black Mountain Ambush after Tabitha has died or left.
If eval (VFreeformBlackMountain.TabithaLeaving || TabithaREF.GetDead) if BMTLD == 0 TabithaDethroned.Disable set BMTLD to 1 endif Endif
;BoS stuff - are they NCR-alligned, is Hardin in power, are they wiped out?
If eval (vDialogueHiddenValley.JoinedBrotherhood && GetFactionCombatReaction TLDBoSFaction playerfaction != 2) ;if player joins the brotherhood, sets all of TLD's BoS personell to act as allies if VStoryEventBoS != 2 setally TLDBoSFaction playerfaction endif Endif
If GetStageDone VMS55 100 ;Lockdown lifted under McNamarra if BosLockdown == 0 BoSLockdownLifted.enable set BosLockdown to 1 endif Endif
If GetStageDone VMS55 101 ;Hardin in power, Anti-NCR types enabled all over. if BosConTLD == 0 BoSHardin.enable TLDBosOutpost.enable TLDBosOutpostPersonell.enable set BosConTLD to 1 endif Endif
If VStoryEventBoS == 2 ;BoS Wiped out, disabling all of them save for some remnants at the safehouse. if BoSDead == 0 BoSAlliance.disable BoSHardin.disable BoSdiscovered.disable BoSLockdownLifted.disable SetEnemy TLDBoSFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 SetEnemy TLDBosFaction NCRFactionNV 0 0 SetEnemy TLDBosFaction ArmorNCRFactionNV 0 0 TLDBosRemnants.enable if TLDBosOutpostPersonell.getDisabled == 0 TLDBosOutpostPersonell.disable TLDPlasmaGangersMarker.enable endif
if SatoREF.getdead == 0 TLDFakeSatoRef.enable SatoREF.kill SatoREF.moveto GameOverTeleporter SatoRef.disable endif
set BoSDead to 1 endif
;Pro NCR BoS - NCR-friendly BoS soldiers patrol I15 and a checkpoint appears south of Sloan, as well as two BoS soldiers guarding the entrance at MO.
Elseif VStoryEventBoS == 1 ;Alliance between NCR and BoS. Faction relations changed accordingly if BoSProTLD == 0 BoSAlliance.enable TLDBosOutpost.enable TLDBosOutpostPersonell.enable BoSHardin.disable ;There you go, Trooper SetAlly TLDBosFaction NCRFactionNV 0 0 SetAlly TLDBosFaction ArmorNCRFactionNV 0 0 SetAlly TLDBosFaction 188GeneralFaction 1 1 SetAlly TLDBosFaction vMojaveCivilianFaction 1 1 SetGlobalValue TLDNCRPowerArmorVar 100 SetGlobalValue TLDCombatArmorVar 0 ;print "BoS TruceStuff" set BoSProTLD to 1 endif Endif
If VDialogueHiddenValley.HowPlayerEntered ;BoS Procurement Specialists spawn in once Hidden Valley bunker entered if BoSProcurement == 0 BoSdiscovered.enable set BosProcurement to 1 endif Endif
;Charlie Legion ambush (own var necessary for FPGE compatibility)
If VFreeformNovac.nRangerStationCharlieStage == 20 if CharlieTLD == 0 CharlieMarker.Enable endif Endif
;Cottonwood Cove Disabler
If vCCEyeforaneye.iLeadersKilled if CottonwoodTLD == 0 CottonwoodMarker.Disable 1 set CottonwoodTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Counterfeiter event at Sunset Sarsaparilla HQ for Pressing Matters. If GetQuestRunning VMS51 if CounterfeiterTLD == 0 TLDCounterfeiterSSref.enable set CounterfeiterTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Fiends: have they been wiped out? Disables all newly placed fiends, makes some remnants show up north of Westside, NCR patrol in the area.
If VStoryEventFiends if FiendsTLD == 0 FiendsDeadMarker.disable TLDFiendBossREF.enable TLDWSEventRef.disable endif
if NCRWastelandGeneral.getdisabled == 0 Patrol5REF.enable TLDNCRExecutioner1ref.enable TLDFiendMercPatrol.enable endif set FiendsTLD to 1 Endif
;Forlorn Hope: NCR wins the conflict.
IF vstorystate < 61 If getobjectivecompleted VMS30 150 if TLDLegionAttackEnabler.getdisabled TLDLegionAttackEnabler.enable 1 endif Endif Endif
;Freeside - watch this space.
IF GetObjectiveCompleted VFSDebtCollector 80 ;Upon handing Caleb's hat to Francine and leaving the Wrangler, a static clone of it will appear on top of the mounted Mole Rat head as a trophy. Unless the player kills her first. That's right smartasses, I considered that possibility. If TLDMcCafferyTrophyREF.getdisabled if eval player.getincell FreesideAtomicWrangler == 0 && VFSFrancineGarretREF.getdead == 0 ;Checks if player is being an incel inside the Wrangler TLDMcCafferyTrophyREF.enable endif EndIf ENDIF
;Goodsprings: Wasteland Wanderer appears when Powdergang defeated and road cleared.
IF GetObjectiveCompleted VMS16 70 If GoodspringsTLD == 0 if MojaveOutpostTLD GSTraderRef.enable set GoodspringsTLD to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;GunRunner Caravan - was made a seperate from Mojave Outpost stuff because they are very powerful and sell a ton of good stuff, thus making delayed spawns a necessity.
If eval (player.getlevel >= 12 && TLDGunRunnerCaravan.getdisabled) if eval (LRNukedNCR == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0) TLDGunRunnerCaravan.enable endif Endif
;Jacobstown: some mutants leave Jacobstown following the completion of "Unfriendly Persuasions", patrolling the forest and hunting for meat/getting sluaghtered by Cazadores.
If GetQuestCompleted VMS50 if TLDJacobstownPatrol.getdisabled TLDJacobstownPatrol.enable endif Endif
;Khans destroyed or ousted otherwise.
If VStoryEventKhans == 2 if KhansDestroyedTLD == 0 KhansWipedOut.Disable PGGKAllianceMarker.Disable KhanPusher1.AddScriptPackage TLDgameoverTravel KhanPusher1.MoveTo GameOverTeleporter 1 1 1 TLDKhanChemPusherLong.disable KhanWestSideRef.disable set KhansDestroyedTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Khans: Aba Daba Honeymoon completed, Khans now selling Meds
If GetStageDone VMS46 100 if KhansMeds == 0 SetGlobalValue TLDKhanChemVar 0 set KhansMeds to 1 endif Endif
;Levelled spawns - ensures a handful of selected npcs don't spawn until a certain level is met. This to ensure a semblance of balance (LOL)
If eval (player.getlevel >= 8 && Level8TLD == 0) && LessNPCsVar == 0 if TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0 TLDKhanChemPusherLong.enable TLDMutantTraveler.enable TLDMercSpawn.enable TLDNCRScout1Ref.enable NorthWestRouteDisabler.enable WastelanderMarker.enable TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.enable TLDProspectorPlatinumReplacementRef.enable set Level8TLD to 1 ;Variable required due to FPGE making getdisabled check unreliable endif Endif
;Lonesome Road, nuked NCR.
If eval (NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 1 || NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 3) if LRNukedNCR == 0 TLDNukedref.enable ;MO medical tent stuff TLDNukedGhould.setRestrained 1 TLDNukedGhouls.setRestrained 1 MOCleared.disable ;Disables MO Travelers TLDGunRunnerCaravan.disable QJCleared.disable ;Disables SW travelers LRNCR.enable set LRNukedNCR to 1 endif Endif
;LR Tunnelers - appear after concluding LR's story, regardless of ending - the Tunnelers are coming Bulllll and Beeeeeeeeeaaar at theiir claaaaaaaaaaawwwwwws
If eval GetQuestCompleted NVDLC04MQ04 && TunnelersVar == 0 if TunnelersTLD == 0 LRCompleted.enable LRTunnelerCaves.enable set TunnelersTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Mojave Outpost patrol control: Ants cleared from road, Jackson opens the road to Nipton and Primm, travelers disappear from the bar.
If eval GetStageDone vMojave 35 || (JacksonQuestSkipvar && TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0) if eval (MojaveOutpostTLD == 0 && LRNukedNCR == 0) MOCleared.enable set MojaveOutpostTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Main Quest 1 (Confronted Benny), enables a Legion and NCR patrol respectively to showcase rising tensions.
If GetStageDone vMQTops 80 if eval (LRNukedNCR == 0 && MQ1TLD == 0) MQ1Legion.enable MQ1NCR.enable TLDLegionStage1Explorer.disable ;Disables a lone Legion Explorer; he has scouted out the area for the patrol now, plus, performance set MQ1TLD to 1 endif Endif
;Main Quest 2, enables more patrols.
If VStoryState >= 30 if eval LRNukedNCR == 0 && MQ2TLD == 0 LegionMQ2.enable MQ2NCR.enable TLDMODeadGuyRef.enable set MQ2TLD to 1 endif Endif
;Main Quest 3 - even more patrols, the war is racketing up.
If VStoryState >= 40 if MQ3TLD == 0 LegionMQ3.enable MQ3NCR.enable set MQ3TLD to 1 endif Endif
;Nelson: NCR wins the conflict. NCR Patrol starting at Forlorn Hope, turns gas station into NCR outpost.
IF eval (vStoryEventNelson == 1 && NelsonTLD == 0) If eval (TLDFPGEQuest.HouseVictoryConsequences == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.IndependentVictoryConsequences == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0) if ForlornHopeDead.getdisabled NelsonDead.enable TLDEldoradoBanditDisabler.enable SetCellOwnership SLElDoradoGasINT NCRFactionNV TLDLegionGasStationAttackTriggerRef.enable TLDLegionAttackEnabler.Disable set NelsonTLD to 1 endif Endif
ELSEIF (vStoryEventNelson == 2 && NelsonTLD == 0) If eval (TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.HouseVictoryConsequences == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.IndependentVictoryConsequences == 0 && TLDFPGEQuest.NCRVictoryConsequences == 0) if NelsonDead.getdisabled ForlornHopeDead.enable TLDEldoradoBanditDisabler.enable set NelsonTLD to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;NOVAC
If NovacTLD == 0 if GetStageDone VMS01 100 ;Peaceful ending state, rockets launched. TLDNovacProspectorTrader.enable
if (TLDNovacProspector01REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector01REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector01REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 ;so they don't get their asses kicked quite as hard by the ferals TLDNovacProspector01REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
if (TLDNovacProspector02REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector02REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector02REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 TLDNovacProspector02REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
if (TLDNovacProspector03REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector03REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector03REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 TLDNovacProspector03REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
if RepconnCourseCorrectTLD == 0 TLDRepconnLaunch.enable TLDRepconnGhoulCaptiveREF.enable endif
set NovacTLD to 1
elseif GetStageDone VMS01 101 ;Crashed rockets TLDRepconnRads.enable TLDNovacProspectorsMarker.disable
set NovacTLD to 1
elseif GetStageDone VMS01 102 ;Massacred the ghouls TLDNovacProspectorTrader.enable
if (TLDNovacProspector01REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector01REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector01REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 ;so they don't get their asses kicked quite as hard by the ferals TLDNovacProspector01REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
if (TLDNovacProspector02REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector02REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector02REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 TLDNovacProspector02REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
if (TLDNovacProspector03REF.getdead == 0 && TLDNovacProspector03REF.getitemcount armorleather == 0) TLDNovacProspector03REF.additem CondLeatherArmor 1 TLDNovacProspector03REF.equipitem ArmorLeather endif
set NovacTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Powder Gang; finally got it to work here this time around, I'm stoopid and this mod is a bloated mess - anyway, once Eddie's dead, the gang falls apart.
If NCRCFEddieRef.GetDead If PowderGangTLD == 0 if eval (VStoryState != 61 || 62) PowderGangDeathMarker.disable PowderGangPatrol2ref.disable TLDNCRprisonPatrol.enable set PowderGangTLD to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
IF (getQuestCompleted VMS02 && NCRCFEddieRef.GetDead == 0) If PowderGangPatrol2ref.getdisabled if TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0 PowderGangPatrol2ref.enable endif Endif ENDIF
;Pressing Matters Counterfeiter
If GetQuestRunning VMS51 if TLDCounterfeiterSSref.GetDisabled TLDCounterfeiterSSref.Enable endif Endif
;Primm has any new Sheriff, makes NPCs stop by there sometimes, maybe enables other stuff if I get around to adding it.
If eval (VStoryEventPrimm == 1 && PrimmTLD == 0) set PrimmTLD to 1 Endif
; If (nvPrimmDeputyConv.MeyerSheriffState || nvPrimmDeputyConv.PrimmSlimSheriffState) ADD CONSEQUENCES FOR THESE PATHS HERE ; Endif
;Primm NCR propaganda and tax collector.
If nvPrimmDeputyConv.NCRSheriffState if PrimmNCRTLD == 0 NCRPrimm.enable set PrimmNCRTLD to 1 endif Endif
;Securitrons MK II -> Vegas presence at switching station north of Westside, seemed fitting since according to the game guide, this station is still active and Mr House/Yes Man wouldn't want anyone to sabotage this place. ;Also enables a Securitron patrolling through the entire wasteland, since Vegas has its eyes all over the Mojave.
If VStoryIndependentState == 2 if TLDsecuritron1Ref.GetFactionRelation PlayerREF != 2 SetAlly TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 endif Endif
If SecuritronsTLD == 0 if VStoryEventSecuritronsUpgraded TLDSecuritronReplaceMentClarkField.disable TLDProspectorPlatinumReplacementRef.disable MKIIUpdate.enable setally TLDWastelandSecuritronFaction PlayerFaction 1 1 ;So Trooper/AVUU stops pestering me about it. I s'pose it only makes sense.
if TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.getdisabled == 0 TLDNCRProspectorsSecuritronReplacement.disable endif set SecuritronsTLD to 1 endif Endif
;SLOAN/Quarry Junction was cleared; enables travellers on I15 and determines whether the Black Mountain Ambush is staged.
IF vFreeformSloan.bDeathclawLeadersDead If VStoryState != 62 if eval (GetQuestCompleted VMS57 == 0 && SloanTLD == 0) QJCleared.enable QJdeathclawsV19ref.enable PGSpawnHunterRef.enable TabithaDethroned.enable SWranger.enable set SloanTLD to 1
;Tabitha has already been taken out:
elseif eval (GetQuestCompleted VMS57 && SloanTLD == 0) QJCleared.enable QJdeathclawsV19ref.enable PGSpawnHunterRef.enable set SloanTLD to 1 endif Endif If eval (VStoryState <= 61 && SWranger.getDisabled) SWranger.enable Endif ENDIF
;Vault 19 Powder Gang - enables more people if Sloan was cleared out and Cooke's not dead yet, makes them dissapear again after "Why Can't We Be Friends", also potentially enables more Khans at RR.
If SloanTLD if V19TLD == 0 Vault19Marker.Enable 1 set V19TLD to 1 endif Endif
;If the quest has been ended in *any* way except Cooke's, the Powder Gangers in the area will disappear.
If eval (VMS42.vEndingJoinedKhans || VMS42.vEndingLemSurrenders || VMS42.vEndingEveryoneIsDead || VSamuelCookeREF.getdead ) if V19TLD < 2 Vault19Marker.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable set V19TLD to 2 endif Endif
;Cooke has his way, alliance with the Khans is formed. New recruits with PG appearance show up in Red Rock; various Khans now carry dynamite.
If V19TLD == 0 if VMS42.vEndingJoinedKhans TLDDynamiteRef1.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef2.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef3.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef4.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef5.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef6.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDDynamiteRef7.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 KhanPatrolRef.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 KhanPusher1.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 TLDKhanChemPusherLong.additem LootNVDynamite100 1 Vault19Marker.Disable PGPatrolV19.Disable PGGKAllianceMarker.enable set V19TLD to 1 endif Endif
;Vault 22 stuff If V22TLD == 0 if eval (getstagedone vms06 30 || getstagedone vms06 32) Vault22NCRMarker.enable TLDVault22CarSpotRef.disable set V22TLD to 1 endif Endif
;Vault 34 stuff
IF GetObjectiveCompleted VES34Vault 40 ;Disables healthy corn at Sharecropper farm and blocks off greenhouses. Also spawns in NCR Deserter attack near Westside. If TLDSharecroppermarker.getdisabled == 0 TLDSharecroppermarker.disable TLDWestsideDeserterAssaultMarker.enable ;print "V34 Disabled" Endif ELSEIF GetObjectiveCompleted VES34Vault 30 ;Enables caravan connecting El Rey camp and Sharecropper Farms as well as additional farmers to showcase they're doing better. If VStoryState <= 61 if V34TLD == 0 TLDSharecropperCaravan.enable ;print "V34 Enabled" set V34TLD to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Westside stuff
IF WestsideVAR ;Makes it so Westside receives a population boost if the player so wishes. Made this into an option to prepare compatibility with Westside Story, coming to a modding site near you sometime this decade! If TLDFPGEQuest.LegionVictoryConsequences == 0 if WestsideMarker.getdisabled WestsideMarker.enable endif Endif ELSEIF WestsideVAR == 0 If WestsideMarker.getdisabled == 0 WestsideMarker.disable Endif ENDIF END

SCN TLDAssassinsscript
int AssassinsActive
int BoSAs int CrimsonANDVanGraffs int CrimsonAs int FreesideAs int GreatKhanAs int GsAs int KingsAS int NovacAs int NukedAS int OmertaAS int PrimmAs int StripAS int VanGraffAS int WestsideAS int WhiteGloveAs
BEGIN GameMode
IF TLDQuest.HitsquadDisabledVar == 0
;Brotherhood
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If eval (NolanMcNamaraREF.IsKiller Player || VStoryEventBoS == 2) if BoSAs == 0 if VStoryState < 61 BoSAssassinsRef.enable set BoSAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif endif Endif ENDIF
;Crimson Caravans
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If AliceMcLaffertyREF.IsKiller Player || GetObjectiveCompleted VCassCompanion 80 if CrimsonAs == 0 TLDCrimsonAssassinsRef.enable TLDCrimsonAssassinsRef.additem TLDContractKillerNoteCrimsonCaravanAlice 1 set CrimsonAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Crimson Caravans consequence for completing Cass' quest violently.
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If VanGraffAS if CrimsonAs if CrimsonANDVanGraffs == 0 set CrimsonANDVanGraffs to 1 TLDVanGraffANDCrimsonRef.Enable set AssassinsActive to 1 endif endif Endif ENDIF
;Freeside
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If GetReputationThreshold RepNvFreeside 1 >= 5 if FreesideAs == 0 ;TLDVFSLeaderRef.enable ;temporarily disabled, since they're kinda annoying and OP set FreesideAs to 1 ; set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Great Khans
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If GetReputationThreshold RepNVGreatKhans 2 >= 5 if GreatKhanAs == 0 if vStoryState < 61 TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.enable 1 ;KhanPatrolRef.disable ;Can't recall why I ever disabled these guys here, but leaving it in case I ever find out. set GreatKhanAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif endif Endif ENDIF
;Goodsprings
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If GetObjectiveCompleted VMS16b 70 if GsAs == 0 GSAssassinLeaderRef.enable GSAssassinLeaderRef.additem TLDVigilanteNoteA 1 TLDCustomerMarker.disable GStakenOver.enable set GsAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Kings
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If VFSTheKingREF.IsKiller Player if KingsAs == 0 set KingsAs to 1 TLDKingsAssassinRef.enable set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Novac
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If GetReputationThreshold RepNVNovac 2 >= 5 if NovacAs == 0 TLDAssassinTier2Novac.enable set NovacAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;NCR Nuke
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 1 if NukedAS == 0 TLDNukedNCRassassins.enable TLDNukedNCRassassins.additem TLDContractLong15 1 set NukedAS to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif Endif
;Omertas
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If eval (VMS21NeroREF.IsKiller Player || VMS21BigSalREF.IsKiller Player) if OmertaAS == 0 set OmertaAS to 1 OmertaAssassinsRef.enable set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Primm
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If eval PrimmJohnsonNashRef.iskiller player || PrimmRubyNashRef.iskiller player if PrimmAs == 0 PrimmAssassinLeaderRef.enable PrimmAssassinLeaderRef.additem TLDVigilanteNoteB 1 set PrimmAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Strip
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If GetReputationThreshold RepNVTheStrip 2 >= 5 if StripAS == 0 && vStoryState < 61 TLDTravelerAssassinRef.enable TLDTravelerAssassinRef.additem TLDContractKillerStrip 1 set StripAS to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Van Graffs
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If eval VFSGloriaVanGraffREF.IsKiller Player || VFSJeanBaptisteCuttingREF.IsKiller Player || GetObjectiveCompleted VCassCompanion 90 if VanGraffAS == 0 TLDVanGraffLeader.enable TLDVanGraffLeader.additem TLDVanGraffAssassinNote 1 set TLDQuest.HarryState to 1 set VanGraffAS to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Van Graffs consequence for solving Cass' quest violently.
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If TLDCrimsonAndVanGraffs.GetDisabled if CrimsonANDVanGraffs TLDCrimsonAndVanGraffs.Enable TLDCrimsonAndVanGraffs.additem TLDContractKillerNoteCrimsonCaravanCassQuest 1 set CrimsonANDVanGraffs to 2 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;Westside
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If WestsideAS == 0 if eval (EttienneREF.iskiller player || HectorREF.iskiller player || JimmyREF.iskiller player || KlamathBobREF.iskiller player || MarcoREF.iskiller player || MeanSonOfABitchREF.iskiller player || MaudeREF.iskiller player || MiguelREF.iskiller player || PrettySarahREF.iskiller player || SweetieRef.iskiller player) TLDWestsideThug.enable set WestsideAS to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF
;White Gloves
IF AssassinsActive == 0 If eval (VMS18MarjorieREF.IsKiller Player || GetReputationThreshold RepNVWhiteGloveSociety 2 >= 5) if WhiteGloveAs == 0 set TLDHitsquadQuest.bhunting to 0 TLDWhiteGlovesAssassins.enable TLDWhiteGlovesAssassins.additem TLDContractKillerNoteWhiteGloves 1 set WhiteGloveAs to 1 set AssassinsActive to 1 endif Endif ENDIF ELSE Return ENDIF END

IF TLDSLHunter1ref.getdead If TLDSLHunter2ref.getdead if RaiderWastelandPresenceMarker.getdisabled == 0 TLDViperTakeOverRef.enable else TLDViperTakeOverRef.disable endif Endif ENDIF END

scn TLDBrightGhoulCaptive
float timer Short DoOnce Short bDisplay Short Button
begin OnDeath Player
SendAssaultAlarm Player vMojaveCivilianFaction
End
Begin GameMode
IF GetinSameCell Player If GetRestrained == 0 if (TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState != 1) if (GetSitting == 3) IgnoreCrime 1 SetRestrained 1 endif Endif Endif ENDIF End
BEGIN OnHit Player
If TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState == 0 stopcombat player Endif End
BEGIN OnActivate
If IsActionRef Player == 1 if ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState == 0) if ( IsActionRef player == 1 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) ShowMessage TecMineHostageMSG Set bDisplay to 1; endif endif elseif TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState Activate endif elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) Activate endif Endif
END
BEGIN Menumode 1001 If (bDisplay == 1) if ( TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState == 0 ) set button to GetButtonPressed If (Button == 0) Set bDisplay to 0; Return; Elseif ( button == 1 ) SetRestrained 0 ignoreCrime 0 Set bDisplay to 0; TLDQuest.BrightFollowerCaptiveState := 1 SetRestrained 0 IgnoreCrime 0 endif endif Endif END

scn TLDWestsideDeath

BEGIN OnDeath

if NVCCAureliusREF.getcauseofdeath == -1 ;Spawn Aurelius ghoul NVCCAureliusREF.moveto GameOverTeleporter NVCCAureliusGhoulREF.enable endif
if WSCottonwoodProspectorREF.getdead == 0 WSCottonwoodProspectorREF.additem ArmorRadiationSuit 1 WSCottonwoodProspectorREF.equipitem ArmorRadiationSuit WSCottonwoodProspectorDOGNormalREF.kill endif disable Endif End

;Triggers appearance of Van Graff knockoff store. The change of name is, obviously, proof of my belief in the superiority of the German language and its patronyms over the cheap knockoff commonly referred to as ""Dutch"" and should be used as evidence in my upcoming cancellation.

scn TLDPylonAmbushQuestScript
Int timerA Int timerB Int Freesiders Int Fiends
BEGIN GameMode
If NightkinAmbushPylonref.GetDead if Freesiders == 0 SetStage TLDPylonAmbush 7 set timerA to (timerA + GetSecondsPassed) endif Endif
If timerA >= 300 set timerA to 0 set Freesiders to 1 Endif
If eval FreesiderRef.GetDead && Fiends == 0 set timerB to (timerB + GetSecondsPassed) Endif
If timerB >= 300 set timerB to 0 set Fiends to 1 SetStage TLDPylonAmbush 10 Endif End

Elseif eval (TLdPylonAmbush.Freesiders && attackshappenednow) SetStage TLDPylonAmbush 9 set attackshappenednow to 2 Endif END

SCN TLDHitSquadControlQuest
int bhunting ;Controls Assassins that hunt player, stops them from appearing in interiors, wrong worldspaces, quest hubs.
BEGIN GameMode
IF TLDAssassins.AssassinsActive If eval (GetPCMovedCell) && Player.GetInWorldspace WastelandNV if (IsPlayerInRegion vMapCanAttackPCHere) if (bhunting) else BoSAssassinsRef.evp TLDVFSLeaderRef.evp TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.evp TLDKingsAssassinRef.evp OmertaAssassinsRef.evp PrimmAssassinLeaderRef.evp GSAssassinLeaderRef.evp TLDWestsideThug.evp TLDAssassinTier2Novac.evp TLDCrimsonAndVanGraffs.evp TLDWhiteGlovesAssassins.evp TLDNukedNCRassassins.evp TLDTravelerAssassinRef.evp TLDCrimsonAssassinsRef.evp TLDVanGraffANDCrimsonRef.evp TLDVanGraffLeader.evp set bhunting to 1 ;print "Hunting" endif
elseif (IsPlayerInRegion vMapCanAttackPCHere == 0) if (bhunting) BoSAssassinsRef.evp TLDVFSLeaderRef.evp TLDGreatKhanRevengeSquadRef.evp TLDKingsAssassinRef.evp OmertaAssassinsRef.evp PrimmAssassinLeaderRef.evp GSAssassinLeaderRef.evp TLDWestsideThug.evp TLDAssassinTier2Novac.evp TLDCrimsonAndVanGraffs.evp TLDWhiteGlovesAssassins.evp TLDNukedNCRassassins.evp TLDTravelerAssassinRef.evp TLDCrimsonAssassinsRef.evp TLDVanGraffANDCrimsonRef.evp TLDVanGraffLeader.evp set bhunting to 0 ;print "Sandboxing" endif endif Endif ENDIF END

scn TLDHitsquadLeaderScript
int DeathCountVar int spawncounterVAR
BEGIN OnDeath
set TLDAssassins.AssassinsActive to 0 ;Allows new squad to spawn in. set DeathCountVar to DeathCountVar + 1
END
BEGIN OnLoad
set spawncounterVAR to spawncounterVAR +1 ;Counts amount of appearances
IF eval (TLDQuest.HitsquadDisabledVar == 0 && spawncounterVAR < 4) ;Squads spawned in before the .ini option was disabled will be cleaned up onload; spawns appearing for the 4th time will be disabled too. If IsInInterior == 0 ;Squads who insist on spawning in an interior despite all other safeguards will be teleported to their editor location instantly. if TLDQuest.HitsquadRespawnVar == 0 if DeathCountVar > 0 Disable endif endif
Else MoveToEditorPosition Endif ELSE disable set TLDAssassins.AssassinsActive to 0 ENDIF
END

scn TLDPylonFourthStageScript
BEGIN OnLoad
If GetDead if NCRDeserterSpawnMarker.GetDisabled NCRDeserterSpawnMarker.Enable endif Endif END

Scn TLDSnyderProspectorEvent
Begin OnLoad
If GetDead LegionSnyderRef.Enable Disable MarkForDelete Endif End

Scn TLDSnyderLegionScript
BEGIN OnLoad
If GetDead ProspectorChanced.Enable ProspectorSandboxSnyder.Enable Disable MarkForDelete Endif
END
BEGIN onDeath
IF getstage vFreeformForlornHope03 == 10 additem legionear 1 EndIF END

scn TLDSCRepconnAmbushTrigger
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
TldAmbushedProspector.AddScriptPackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage Disable MarkForDelete
END

scn TLDBrahminExplodeScript
BEGIN OnDeath
PlaySound3D OBJMegatonBombTamperArm ;Bit of audible feedback so players know to GTFO ScriptWait 180 ;Praise the JIP PlaceAtMe GrenadeFragExplosion 1 END

scn TLDGunRunnerMerchantEquipHelmet
Ref Self
BEGIN OnLoad
set Self to GetSelf
; Merchant uneqips helmet If Self.GetItemCount ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced >= 1 Unequipitem ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced 1 1 Endif END
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN OnStartCombat
Let Self := GetSelf
;Make merchant equip helm, and not show a message If Self.GetItemCount ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced >= 1 Equipitem ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced 0 1 Endif END
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN OnCombatEnd
Let Self := GetSelf
; Make actor unequip power armor helm, and not show a message If Self.GetItemCount ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced >= 1 Unequipitem ArmorCombatHelmetReinforced 1 1 Endif END

scn TLDFiendBossScript
Int Cloaked Int DoOnce
BEGIN OnLoad
IF GetDead If GetDisabled == 0 Disable ;to set disable parent flag MarkForDelete Endif ENDIF END
BEGIN OnStartCombat
IF Cloaked == 0 AddSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 1 ENDIF END
BEGIN OnCombatEnd
If cloaked RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 Endif END
BEGIN OnDeath
If cloaked RemoveSpell StealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set Cloaked to 0 Endif END

scn TLDWestsideFiendAttack
int doOnce
BEGIN ontriggerenter player
If doOnce == 0 Trigger2.enable doOnce := 1 ;Disable ;Markfordelete Endif END

scn TLDWestsideMSBteleporterScript
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
ScriptWait 120 MeanSonOfABitchREF.moveto MSBmarker TLDwestsideMilitiaManEvent.enable TLDwestsideMilitiaManEvent.moveto MSBmarker Disable MarkForDelete END

scn TLDWestsideAttackStage2
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player If MeanSonOfABitchREF.getdead == 0 MSBmarker.enable Endif Disable Markfordelete END

scn TLDcsAttackPlace
int Done int Linked
ref SquadLeader
BEGIN OnLoad
IF Linked == 0 set SquadLeader to getlinkedref set Linked to 1 ENDIF END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter player
IF Done == 0 SquadLeader.addscriptpackage TLDNCRattackCStrigger set Done to 1 ENDIF END

SCN TLDDeleteOnReset
BEGIN OnReset
IF GetDisabled == 0 Disable ;in case the object serves as an enable parent. Markfordelete ENDIF END

scn TLDKhanWestsideScript
BEGIN onload
If Getdead if getdisabled == 0 Disable Markfordelete TLDwestsideKhanRat.MarkForDelete endif Endif end

Scn TLDCliffsideCleanUp
BEGIN OnLoad
If eval getdead || TLDSCprospector.getdead Disable Markfordelete Endif END

scn NovacMerchantDespawn
BEGIN onload
if getdead || NovacDeadMarker.getdisabled disable endif END

Scn TLDAmbushEnabler
Short DoOnce Ref MyLink
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
IF doOnce == 0 If TLDPGAmbusherRef.GetFactionRelation PlayerRef set myLink to getLinkedRef myLink.enable set doOnce to 1 Endif ENDIF END

scn TLDDefaultEnableLinkAndDisableUponLoadScript ;Basic script that enables linked reference and disables it again upon loading
Short DoOnce Ref MyLink
BEGIN onTriggerEnter player
IF doOnce == 0 Set myLink to getLinkedRef MyLink.enable set doOnce to 1 Endif
END
BEGIN onReset
IF myLink.getdisabled == 0 MyLink.disable ENDIF
END

SCN TLDDeleteIfKilled
BEGIN OnLoad
IF GetDead If GetDisabled == 0 moveto GameOverTeleporter ;so even NPCs with enable parents are affected disable Endif ENDIF
END

Scn TLDTunnelerSpawnScript
Int Linked Ref LinkedTunneler Int Attacked
BEGIN OnLoad
If Linked == 0 set LinkedTunneler to GetLinkedREF set Linked to 1 Endif END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
IF TLDTunnelerQueenRef.getdead == 0 If eval (getcurrenttime < 6 || getcurrenttime > 20 ) if Attacked == 0 LinkedTunneler.enable ;Tunneler ick hцr' dir trapsen set Attacked to 1 endif Endif ENDIF END
BEGIN OnReset
If TLDTunnelerQueenRef.getdead == 0 if Attacked set Attacked to 0 endif ElseIf TLDTunnelerQueenRef.getdead LRCompleted.disable LRTunnelerCaves.disable Disable MarkForDelete Endif END

Scn TLDTunnelerScript
BEGIN OnLoad
IF TLDTunnelerQueenRef.getdead == 0 If eval (GetDead || GetDead == 0) if eval (getcurrenttime < 20 && getcurrenttime > 6) MoveToEditorPosition ResurrectActor 0 Disable endif Endif ELSE Disable Markfordelete ENDIF END

Scn TLDTunnelerQueenScript
BEGIN OnLoad If GetDead == 0 if eval (getcurrenttime < 20 && getcurrenttime > 6) MoveToEditorPosition Disable endif ElseIf GetDead Disable MarkForDelete Endif End

SCN TLDYaoGuaiAttackTriggerScript
short BearLinked short SpawnChance int Drawn ref myBear
BEGIN OnLoad
If BearLinked == 0 set myBear to getLinkedRef set BearLinked to 1 Endif
IF TLDQUest.YaoGuaiVar == 0 If eval (player.HasPerk AnimalFriend || TLDYaoGuaiMotherRef.getdead) if TLDYaoGuaisRef.getdisabled TLDYaoGuaisRef.enable MyBear.Disable Disable MarkforDelete endif Else TLDYaoGuaiMotherRef.enable Endif ELSEIF TLDQUest.YaoGuaiVar TLDYaoGuaiMotherRef.disable TLDYaoGuaisRef.disable MyBear.Disable ENDIF END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
IF TLDQUest.YaoGuaiVar == 0 If eval (SpawnChance == 0 && Drawn == 0) set SpawnChance to GetRandomPercent Endif
If Spawnchance >= 50 myBear.enable set Drawn to 1 Else set Drawn to 1 Endif ;print "Triggerentered" ENDIF END
BEGIN OnReset
If Drawn set Drawn to 0 set SpawnChance to 0 MyBear.MovetoEditorPosition MyBear.Resurrect MyBear.disable Endif END

SCN TLDFollowerDistanceScript
ref MyHandler short doOnce short DoOnceLegionStuff
begin onload
if doOnce == 0 set MyHandler to getLinkedRef set doOnce to 1 endif
if getdistance MyHandler > 1500 moveto MyHandler 512 0 0 endif
end
;For future: add even more experimental section here to avoid bug that occurs when you wait/sleep while these NPCs are loaded in
; If the player is disguised as a member of Caesar Legion and he's detected by a special ; sniffer mongrel, the mongrel and its handler sound the alarm.
begin OnStartCombat Player If getinfaction vCaesarsLegionSnifferFaction if eval (GetQR DisguiseFactionPulseQuest == 1) && (IsSpellTarget DisguiseFactionPulseActorEffect == 1) sendAssaultAlarm Player VCaesarsLegionFaction sendAssaultAlarm Player VCaesarsLegionSnifferFaction
if eval (GetDistance player < 512) && MyHandler != 0 MyHandler.Say ChallengePlayer endif endif Endif End

ESP.TRADUIT: 死去的科学工业办公室科学家
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Sex : 男性 Race : African American Clas : Engineer
Sex : 男性 Race : 040083D7 Clas : 0400A679
Sex : 男性 Race : 040083D7 Clas : 0400A679

Sex : 男性 Race : 040083D7 Clas : 0400A679

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Heya Dan,
You were right about this place, it's just what we needed! We're done setting up and already sent a message to Sue and her folks to pack it up over at the old Sarsaparilla factory. Believe me, we'll be raking in tons of caps in no time! There's no way McLafferty's people will catch a whiff of us out here in the boonies, and some creepy hicks to the south keep us supplied with fresh Lakelurk meat in exchange for some of our product - they’re dumb hillbilly trash, so not worried about them realizing we're just giving them compression-molded scrap, ha! When that Courier Sue is banging shows up, I'll have him deliver you a little sample of our work along with this letter - 150 caps, to be exact, best check, fella skeeves me out. Anyway hope your Omerta buddies like them, they were a bitch to produce. Without real machinery, production's slower than it used to be, but at least out here we won't have to worry about any crazed old robots or NCR thugs. Counterfeiting's just a matter of practice anyway. By the way, there's been some Cazadores creeping in lately. So far, a little dynamite was enough to keep 'em at bay, but I'd rather have a permanent solution. Think you can organize us some bug spray? Or a flamethrower?
Tell Jenn I said hi and take care, bro!
Charlie
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，丹，
你说对了，这个地方正是我们所需要的！我们已经布置完成并已经向苏珊和她在旧夕阳沙士工厂的同事们发送了信息，让他们收拾东西赶紧过来，一旦她们到达，我们将再次收获成吨的瓶盖！
在这么远的地方不必担心麦克拉弗蒂的人，南方的一些渔民为我们提供新鲜的湖沼蟹肉以换取我们的一些产品--一些愚蠢的乡巴佬，所以不用担心他们意识到我们正在给他们压缩成型的废品，哈！他们有点阴险，但这是个好消息，意味着他们不太可能出卖我们。
当苏珊的那个邮差出现时，我会让他把我们工作的一小部分样本连同这封信一起寄给你--准确地说，150瓶盖，最好检查一下，不要太相信那个人。
希望你的黑手党朋友喜欢它们，他们生产起来真不容易。没有任何真正的机器，生产速度比以前慢，但至少在这里我们不必担心什么疯狂的旧机器人或NCR暴徒。反正造假只是一个实践问题。
顺便说一下，最近有一些猎蜂爬到了这个地区。到目前为止，一点炸药就足以阻止他们，但我希望有一个永久的解决方案。你能给我们组织一些杀虫剂吗？或者火焰喷射器？
代我向珍问好，保重，兄弟！
- 查理

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friends, we have some more vermin to take care of, and this time it's personal. Remember &PCName;, that courier old Doc Mitchell brought back from the dead in Goodsprings? Well, turns out that very same Courier helped the Powder Gang take over the town and slaughter nearly everyone there soon after. I don't know what hole this good-for-nothing scum crawled from, but they obviously don't know nothing about gratitude and decency around those parts. We can and will not just stand idly by while good folks get pushed around! How about we grab our guns and go out for some hunting? It's about time this hoodlum received a lesson in wasteland justice and gets put back in their rightful place - the grave!
ESP.TRADUIT:
朋友们，我们还有更多害虫要处理，这次是私人恩怨。
还记得那个叫 &PCName; 的邮差吗？那个被老米切尔医生从死里复活的人。结果就是那个邮差帮助炸药帮占领了清泉镇然后很快屠杀了几乎所有人。我不知道这个一无是处的人渣是从哪个鬼地方爬出来的，但他们显然对感恩和体面一无所知。我们不能也不会对善良的人们受到这样的欺凌而袖手旁观。我们拿起枪，出去打猎怎么样？现在是时候让这个流氓接受废土正义的教训，并被送回他们应有的地方--坟墓！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You aren't going to believe this, but I actually was right! I poked around what's left standing of Primm. As suspected, it's a massacre. With the state of affairs around these parts, my first assumption was Powder Gangers, or perhaps Jackals, but I quickly realized this wasn't their handywork, on account of the former decomposing on the streets and the latter being fully absent in any shape or form. I sifted through Mojave Express' files, to check if any Couriers left town before things went south, and would you believe it? &PCName; was one of the last people to check in with them. That's right, &PCName;, a.k.a. "The Courier", came through here to pick up a delivery. Sound familiar to you? Seems like wherever that name comes up, disaster ensues, like it's a bad omen. Or maybe this Courier is more than just a harmless mailman with disastrous timing... My business here is concluded and I can't prove the Courier's direct involvement in what happened to this town - or Hopeville. But if I had to take a guess... well, let's just say I know who my prime suspect is.
Be cautious out there and happy hunting!
~ From the office of Alethia Prayne, private investigator.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你不会相信，但我确实是对的！我在普瑞姆废墟周围探查了一下。正如我所怀疑的那样，这是一场大屠杀。根据这些地方的情况，我的第一个假设是炸药帮，或者可能是豺狼帮，但我很快意识到这不是他们的手法，因为前者在街上腐烂，而后者完全没有任何组织。所以我查看了莫哈维邮件公司的文件，检查是否有任何邮差在事情发生之前离开了城镇，你相信吗， &PCName; 是最后一个向他们报到的人之一。没错， &PCName; 又名“邮差”，来这里送过东西。听起来很熟悉吧？似乎无论这个名字出现在哪里，灾难都会接踵而至，就像是不祥之兆。或者，也许这个邮差不仅仅是一个无害的邮递员，而是有着灾难性的时机...
我在这里的事情已经结束了，我无法证明邮差直接参与了发生在这个城镇或希望城的事情。但如果我不得不猜测，好吧，我知道我的主要嫌疑人是谁。
在那里要小心，祝狩猎愉快！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Got another assignment for y’all. Some wasteland assholes want another wasteland asshole by name of &PCName; sixed for various crimes committed against some Mojave shithole or other, same old story, so here’s the interesting bit: a successful kill will net you no less than a 700 cap cut if you can bring in their head in a recognizable state. Deal? Good. They want to hear good news by the end of the month. Manage to do that and I can get you some of them star caps you been after to sweeten the deal.
Happy huntin’, Clyde
ESP.TRADUIT:
我有一个任务给你，一个平民客户想要一个叫 &PCName;的人死。因为他对莫哈韦某个鬼地方的居民犯下了各种罪行。完成任务后，你会在老地方得到2500瓶盖的奖励。
和往常一样，记得带上杀人的证据。
祝你好运，狩猎快乐！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Contract:
An influential client from the New Vegas Strip has deigned to reach out behind their fancy walls and grace us desert peasants with a rather lucrative assignment. The target is to be considered dangerous and "discourteous", which I understand to be moneybag for “heavily armed and pissed off”. Luckily, they’re not just lacking in clarity of expression, but also have potential for growth vis-a-vis their business acumen - I was able to fleece them of quite a hefty sum in exchange for our services - a simple hit job. Details attached.
Details:
Name: &PCName; Race: &PCRace; Sex: &PCSex;
Conditions:
Target must be eliminated - discreetly so, if possible, but as usual that's your call, client is hardly going to complain so long as the job gets done. Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract. No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 20,000 (in words: twenty thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.
Report back to H.Q. when you’re ready for another mission.
Godspeed and make these decadent clowns happy, V.F.
ESP.TRADUIT:
合同:
新维加斯长街的一位有影响力的客户给我们布置了任务。目标是被认为是危险的和“无礼的”，所以他们想要他死。
细节:
名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;
条件:
目标必须被消灭--如果可能的话，谨慎地这样做，但像往常一样，那是你的决定，只要工作完成，客户几乎不会抱怨。
我们的委托人要求提供目标死亡的证据作为合同中不可协商的条款。
没有预付款。约定的10000NCR纸币将在满足这些条件后存入您的银行账户。
当你准备好执行另一个任务时，向总部报告。
祝你狩猎顺利，
- V

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From the office of Tiaret Van Graff.
Marcel,
Surely you've received word of Glory and Jean-Baptiste's passing. Let me commence this letter by making clear to you that I do not wish to hear your condolences, not a word out of your mouth, in fact I don't want you to ever mention their names to me again. We all know the risks this business brings with it. Every day we face this abyss, closer to the nothingness following our inevitable end, regardless of the means by which it is met and any precautions we devise to protect us from it. Nothing can and will ever change that. However, while we are still in this world, while we are still walking, the most important thing there is, is family. And while we still can fight back, we *must* ensure the annihilation of anyone who poses a threat to our own; and more importantly yet, we *must* defend the family's honor and reputation. That is why I want you to track that murderer and everyone with them down and end them all. Painfully, slowly and for the world to see. Make them suffer for what they did to my children and let everyone know what happens when you sully the name of the Van Graff family. Then, when they are dead, I want you to track down all of their closest relatives and cull their bloodline. It may take you weeks, perhaps months, but you will ensure the name Van Graff will never be uttered without fear and reverence again. Then, when you are finished, you may return to me.
Regards.
ESP.TRADUIT:
马塞尔,
你肯定已经得到了格洛丽亚和让·巴普蒂斯特去世的消息。让我在这封信的开头向你表明，我不希望听到你的哀悼，不希望从你口中听到一个字，事实上我不希望你再向我提及他们的名字。
我们都知道这生意带来的风险。我们每天都面对这个深渊，在我们不可避免的结局之后，我们更接近于虚无，不管我们用什么方法来迎接它，也不管我们采取什么预防措施来保护我们不受它的伤害。没有什么能够也永远不会改变这一点。
然而，当我们还在这个世界上，当我们还在行走的时候，最重要的事情就是，家族。当我们仍有能力反击时，我们*必须*确保绝对消灭任何对我们自己构成威胁的人，我们必须捍卫我们家族的荣誉和声誉。
所以我想让你找到那个凶手和所有跟他们在一起的人，把他们都杀了。痛苦地，慢慢地，让全世界都看到。让他们为对我孩子所做的事付出代价，让所有人知道玷污范·格拉夫家族的名声会有什么下场。等他们死后，我要你追踪到他们所有的近亲并剔除他们的血统。这可能会花费你几周，甚至几个月的时间，但你将确保范·格拉夫家族的名字永远不会在没有恐惧和崇敬的情况下被提起。
然后，当你完成时，你可以回到我这里。
签名，
- 范·格拉夫女士。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
< You read the journal's final entries >
Day 228:
Killed 3 Powder Gangers not far from Goodsprings. Hopefully worth more than the last batch. Took 'em out from quite a distance. Still a decent shot despite fucked-up shoulder.
Day 232:
Picked up bounty from Sheriff in Primm and bought canned goods and ammo from Nash.
Day 235:
Ben spotted 2 BoS Paladins heading south on the train tracks near Sloan around 9 PM. Trying to avoid detection by Powder Gang, it seems. Been following them at a distance for two hours, unnoticed so far. Ain't seen any Tin Cans since Lost Hills, but a welcome change from pussy ex-cons who can barely fend for themselves. Waiting for them to take a break, so we can lay down mines and prepare an attack. Time to get my revenge, and a nice new suit of armor too.
Entry 237:
Got them in the early morning. Tin Cans sat down at campsite near what's left of Nipton to take a rest 'til sunrise. Put down pulse mines all over tracks heading towards the border and each took position on surrounding hills to pincer them. First one got fried in PA, shot second through armor joints with AP rounds while Ben flanked him, then tracked blood trail when he took off, just like back in the war. Didn't make it 100 yards before bleeding out. First suit destroyed by EMP, Ben agreed to give second one to me, just need to wash the blood out. Servos seem busted and fusion core is close to depleted, so don't think I'll be keeping it for very long. NCR might be interested in buying, Oliver likes to dress his boys up in disabled suits. Fucking deathtraps. Don't matter. We won. Didn't bring Juliet back, but still feelt damn good.
Read their orders too, were sent to investigate some sort of pre-war space satellite that went down near Nipton. Interesting, might wanna go and take a closer look some day. For now just gonna set up camp on the hills and lay the carcasses on the train tracks alongside GPS tracker. Wait if any more BoS come looking for their friends. Might not kill them outright, rather follow 'em back and find out where they live.
ESP.TRADUIT:
<您读取日志的最后一个条目>
条目31:
在清泉镇附近干掉了三个炸药帮。希望他们比上一批值钱一点。把他们从很远的地方带出来。真是一记好球，虽然该死的肩膀受伤了。
条目32:
从普瑞姆警长那里得到了赏金，然后在纳什那儿买了罐头和弹药。
条目33:
晚上9点左右，本在斯隆附近的铁路上发现了2个钢铁兄弟会圣骑士在往南走。看起来是为了躲避炸药帮的侦查。我远远地跟着他们两个小时了，没人注意到。从失落山丘之后我就没见这些铁罐头了，但比起在这里几乎无法自谋生路的孬种前科犯来说，这是一个可喜的变化。等他们休息一下，我们就可以埋下地雷，准备进攻。
是时候复仇了，还有一套漂亮的新盔甲。
条目34:
一大早就拿到了。在尼普顿废墟附近的营地上，铁罐头们坐着休息直到太阳升起。在通往边境的轨道上布满脉冲地雷，每个地雷都在周围的山上就位等待它们。第一个人被炸了，第二个人被子弹打穿了装甲关节，而本从反方向的侧面包围了他，然后在他逃走时追踪血迹，就像在战争中一样。他还没走到100码就失血而死。第一套动力甲被电磁脉冲给破坏了，本同意把第二套给我，只需要把血迹洗掉。虽然没能让朱丽叶起死回生，但还是感觉很好。
读了他们的命令，他们被派去调查战前在尼普顿附近坠落的某种太空卫星。有意思，也许哪天你会想去仔细看看。现在我们要在山上扎营把尸体放在铁轨上和GPS追踪器放在一起。等着看是否有更多的兄弟会成员来找他们的朋友。也许我不会直接杀了它们，而是跟着它们，找到它们的老巢。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Crimson Caravans caught wind of our operation, pack your shit and get moving before their thugs show up. Dan told me about an abandoned shack north of Lake Mead, a few clicks east of Jenn’s outpost. Place already has the essentials set up, so I guess that's where we're headed. Grab all the caps and raw materials you can carry and shake a fucking leg, okay? We need all hands on deck up here, so order that Courier friend of yours to come right back too, need to loop Dan in. Good luck and see you around!
Charlie
ESP.TRADUIT:
苏珊，深红商队知道了我们的行动，你得收拾东西，在他们的手下出现之前赶紧行动。丹跟我说过米德湖北部有个废弃的小木屋，那里已经准备好了必需品，所以我猜我们现在要去那里。
带上所有你能带的瓶盖叫你的邮差朋友回来我告诉丹我们要走了，现在没办法抽出人手来做这个。如果他告诉珍是我派他来的，珍会让他自由通过检查点的。祝你好运，回头见！
- 查理

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dan, I'm sorry. Couldn't protect your brother like I promised. Damned bugs came outta nowhere, chasing after that Courier Susan been hiring to move the goods. Little cur almost made it in, but was too slow, died just close enough so they could spot us. Bugs was swarming all over the place, tried to barricade the doors, but fuckers came through the roof. They were too fast and too many to fend off, so I made for the basement. Charlie got stung. Ain't nothin I coulda done for him, I'm sorry. Now ever body’s gone, and I can hear the Cazadores up there, chewing on the door, crawling round the house, waitin on me. Only one bullet left. Talk bout a hint of fate. Ain't no way I'll make it through them, so gon end things on my own terms. Don't feel bad for leading us here. Couldnt a known. You pulled me out that ditch in Reno back then and always was a brother to me. Toiled just as hard as us mopes out here to make it big one day. Ain’t enough folks like you, and that’s what ails this sick joke of a world. Now I got nothin left to write. Thanks for ever thing, pardner. Gonna buy you a round in the great corall up there.
Pete
ESP.TRADUIT:
丹，如果你读到这个，我很抱歉。 对不起，我没能像我承诺的那样保护你的兄弟。 该死的虫子不知从哪儿冒出来，追着苏珊雇来搬运货物的邮差。差点就进来了，但是速度太慢了，死在了足够近的地方，让虫子发现了我们。它们蜂拥而至，试图想把门堵住，但该死的虫子却从墙壁里钻了进来。它们速度太快，数量太多，无法抵挡，所以我去了地下室。查理被蜇了，我无能为力。 抱歉。
现在所有人都完了，我可以听到猎蜂在上面咬门，在房子里爬行。 只剩下一颗子弹了。谈论命运的暗示，不可能通过它们，所以我要以我自己的方式结束事情。 丹，不要为带我们到这里而感到难过。我不可能不知道，你把我从里诺的那条沟里拉了出来，对我来说总是像兄弟一样。 谢谢你所做的一切，伙计。
下辈子我们还会再见的。
- 皮特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
< There are only a handful of entries in the notebook. You start with the first. >
Picked this book off some dumbass Brahmin driver who wanted to play hero. Figured keeping a log on our ops would provide a bit of mental stimulation, lest the sun or having to deal with these dimwits all day fries what's left of my brain - rather not go feral yet. Anyway, gotta get my thoughts in order, getting hard to recall shit sometimes. Name's Jon Murphy, former NCR Ranger, before Searchlight happened. They didn’t pension me ‘cause I figured I was still fit to work and had some anti-discriminatory laws backing my case, “partial disability”, “reintegration into service” all that bullshit. Went alright at first, till I realized they wanted to keep me off the battlefield all the way to pension age. No fucking honor in being an honorary Ranger and full-time paper pusher anyway, so started to make some extra money on the side. Brass wasn’t fond of that, so now I’m a deserter at large. Pleased to meet you, whoever steals this off my corpse - best make sure I'm really dead, might just look it motherfucker.
Day 1 Been a bit over 3 days now since I "dishonorably discharged" myself. Stupid bitch Boyd always was suspicious of me, guess one of these snitch-ass recruits tipped her off, no other way she could've known about my stash. Fuck, I don't go around sticking my nose in other people's business neither, and not just 'cause I don't have one no more. What's she care what the troopers do in their down time? Anyway, barely dodged the MPs that night and snuck out of camp. So much for that pension, haha. Things ain't all bad though, was prepared, after all. Met Joey at the designated spot, most of his guys made it out of camp via the monorail, unharmed, unnoticed. Alvarez and King are also there, and a handful others he got hooked with my shit. Joey's useful enough for a farm boy, pragmatic, strong, hates the army, and most of all, he's a hopeless fucking addict, though he don't wanna admit it to himself yet. He'll do whatever I tell him so long as I keep plenty of Jet around. Seems a little shaken about the way things went down, but gots to keep it together for his guys and a lack of alternatives. Eh, he'll come around eventually. Anyway, quickly convinced them we'll need to garner up some more caps to get outta Vegas and keep my suppliers happy and generous, so started using our uniforms and well-learned all-official NCR talk to get the caravans to cough up a "road toll". Works real wonders for the most part - ‘cept for the kid who owned this ledger before, I guess...
Day 7 Either people are losing their respect for the military, or the caravans are starting to wise up. They don't carry as many caps anymore, even had one straight up refuse to pay us, lost a guy taking them out. Also seems there are more troops pouring into the area, getting harder to dodge the patrols. Are they looking for me? Rogue Rangers are bad business after all, even decrepit zombie ones who cheated their way through training. Or maybe it's cause of the Legion? Wish I'd had the time to take my radio with me, wouldn't wanna stick around when they hit.
Day 8 Like I didn’t have enough shit on my plate, Joey’s starting to get uppity. Keeps on bitching about the heat, the cold, people we killed, said we're traitors and need to “face justice”. Said it’s my fault we’re in this mess, called me a snake right to my fucking face, that jethead cunt. Gonna have to kill him, only a matter of time for him to rat us out and I don't fancy a summary execution. Trouble is, some of these other boneheads really like him. When push comes to shove, they’d rather side with their old brother in arms than some stinking zombie in ranger gear, even if the alternative is 5 to the chest on McCarran courtyard. God, my head is killing me.
Day 9 Seems luck is still on my side. Ran into a bunch of stingy Prospectors today, said we're too ragged to be actual NCR, they’d never seen a zombie in uniform before, usual bigoted shit. Tried resisting but didn't last long. Joey took a slug to the gut though, coughing up blood, losing consciousness. His boys insisted on dragging him back to camp, but I say he won't last another day. Lucky! Plus, those wasteland fucks had some Psycho on them.
Day 11 That smoothskin motherfucker still refuses to die, even seems like he’s getting better. That bitch Alvirez keeps him flying with MY STASH OF JET!! so he don't get withdrawals while he's out. Gotta admit, that stubbornness of his reminds me of myself, dragging my irradiated ass out of Searchlight - on the other hand I’d rather not have that little fuckstick back on his feet, he'll run back to Boyd first chance he gets, or just turn on me outright. Still haven’t used up all the Psycho, can think of a good alternate use. Need only one moment alone with him.
Day 12 Buried Joey a ways off from camp. His guys seem shaken up for the time being, but by now they’ve gotten used to losing friends. Seems no one suspects a thing, ‘sides Alvirez, but she won’t make a move, not while she’s addled to my shit. Good. Far as they’re concerned, I’m the undisputed leader now. We’ve only gathered a handful of caps, splashed out the rest on chems. Still, I believe we should get a move on ASAP, things are heating up in Vegas and I can feel NCR’s breath down my peeling neck. Going to hit one more caravan tomorrow, then head up north. Heard stories about this place called Zion - ought to be far enough away from Legion and NCR to begin a new life. Just need to ask my contacts if they know anyone up that way. Need to keep these fools drugged-up and happy, always. Goddamn headache again, gonna continue later…
ESP.TRADUIT:
<这个笔记本上只有几条记录。从第一条开始>
这本书是从一个愚蠢的放牛人那里买来的，他想成为一个英雄，他认为在我们的行动中记录日志可以提供一点精神上的刺激，以免太阳或者每天都要和这些傻瓜打交道会把我脑袋中剩下的理智炸掉，避免我更加野性。
我叫乔恩·墨菲，前NCR游骑兵，在探照灯营地事件发生之前。
他们没有给我发养老金是因为我觉得我还适合工作而且有一些反歧视的法律支持我的案子，艺术残疾？以及搑加入军队？还有那些废话。一开始一切顺利，直到我意识到他们想让我远离战场一直到退休年龄。作为一个荣誉游骑兵和摆弄文件的人没有什么荣誉感可言，所以我开始赚一些额外的钱。布拉斯没有问题 我很喜欢这个主意，所以这些天我当了 逃兵。很高兴见到你，不管是谁偷了我尸体上的这个-最好确定我真的死了，我可能只是躺在这里看看你，混蛋。
第一天
自从我自己被“不光彩地开除”以来已经有3天多了。傻逼博伊德一直在怀疑我，我猜是其中一个告密的新兵给她通风报信的，不然她也不可能知道我藏毒品的地方。妈的，我也不会到处去管别人的事，不仅仅是因为我没有别人了。她干嘛要关心骑警们休息的时候做什么?不管怎么说，那天晚上几乎没躲过国会议员就溜出了营地。养老金到此为止了，哈哈。
但事情也不全是坏事，毕竟我们已经准备好了。在指定地点遇见了乔伊，他的手下大部分人都通过单轨列车逃出了营地，毫发无伤，没人注意到。阿尔瓦雷斯和金也在那里，还有他队里的几个人他迷上了我的东西。乔伊对一个农场男孩来说很有用，务实，强壮，讨厌军队，最重要的是，他是个无可救药的瘾君子，尽管他还不想承认。只要我有足够的喷气机，他什么都愿意做。他似乎对事情的发展方式有些动摇，但他的队员们能保持团结，而且没有其他选择。
让他参与是正确的，他最终会接受的。
无论如何，我们很快就说服了他们，我们需要在离开拉斯维加斯之前积累更多的瓶盖，因此开始使用我们的制服和渊博的官方NCR谈话来让商人们支付一些“公路通行费”。希望我们在我的突击者的日子里也有一些这样的东西，在大多数情况下都能产生真正的奇迹--除了之前拥有这本书的那个孩子，我猜...
第七天
要么人们对军队失去了敬意，要么商队开始变得聪明起来。他们不再带那么多瓶盖了，甚至有一个人拒绝付钱给我们，我干掉了他们。而且似乎有更多的军队涌入该地区，越来越难躲避巡逻人员。他们在找我吗?流氓游骑兵毕竟不是什么好买卖，即使是那些在训练中作弊的老朽僵尸。
还是因为军团的缘故?真希望我有时间带着收音机，他们来的时候我可不想待在这。
顺便说一句，乔伊是错的，继续抱怨炎热、寒冷、我们杀的人,说我们是叛徒，需要正义吗?表示,该公司抯我的错我们抮e在这种混乱,叫我一条蛇我他妈的脸,那个傻逼
我得杀了他，他会告发我们的我可不想因为逃兵被枪毙。问题是，有些人真的很喜欢他，在紧要关头，这些笨蛋宁愿和他们的老哥并肩作战，也不愿和穿着游骑兵装备的臭僵尸站在一起，即使这样会让他们在麦卡伦营地的院子里被射杀。
第九天
看来运气还是站在我这边。今天遇到一群小气的淘金客,说我们看起来太脏了，不可能是真正的 NCR，他们以前从未见过穿制服的僵尸。我们试图反抗，但没坚持多久。乔伊胸口挨了一枪，咳血，失去了知觉。他的孩子们坚持要把他拖回营地，但我觉得他可能一天也活不下去了。幸运!再加上那些在荒地上的混蛋有一些疯子在他们的派对时间!
第十一天
那个顽固的滑皮混蛋仍然不肯死，甚至看起来越来越好，那个婊子阿尔维雷斯让他带着我的喷气机飞起来！！这样他不在的时候就不会提款了。不得不承认我忍不住同情他，让我想起了我自己把我受过辐射的屁股从探照灯营地里拖出来--另一方面，我宁愿不让那个小瘾君子站起来，他会跑回博伊德他得到的第一次机会。还没有抰用完所有的精神病，可以想出一个很好的替代用途，前提是我和他有一个无人监督的时刻。
第十二天 把乔伊埋在离营地很远的地方。他的伙计们暂时看起来很受打击，但他们又一次习惯了时不时失去一些朋友。似乎没有人怀疑这件事，即使是阿尔维雷斯。好的。就他们现在而言，我是无可争议的领导者。我们真的只收集了一些瓶盖，但我相信我们应该尽快采取行动，维加斯的情况正在升温，我可以感觉到 NCR 抯从我脱皮的脖子上呼吸。明天再抢一辆大篷车，然后向北走。我听说过这个叫锡安的地方的故事 - 应该离军团和 NCR 足够远才能开始新的生活。只需要想出一个帮派名称......

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Contract:
I’ve received a new assignment from a longstanding client back in the heartland that should be right up your alley - they want you to make an example of the targets for disturbing their business interests. They’re seriously mad and want both marks as well as any further associates present silenced, and they want it done *yesterday*. There are no stipulations as for collateral damage, discretion, method of elimination - you can let your creativity run wild, the most important thing is it gets done. As for payment, give the conditions section a look for a pleasant surprise.
Details:
Target 1: Name: Rose of Sharon Cassidy (Yes, I know.) Race: Caucasian Sex: Female
Target 2: Name: &PCName; Race: &PCRace; Sex: &PCSex;
Conditions: Targets must be eliminated. Our client demands proof of the targets’ deaths as a non-negotiable clause of contract. No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 30,000 (in words: thirty thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.
Report back to H.Q. when you're ready for another assignment.
This is a big one, so don't mess it up, V.F.
ESP.TRADUIT:
合同:
接到了一个来自中部地区的长期客户的新任务--希望你能将扰乱他们商业利益的目标人物杀鸡儆猴。
细节:
名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;
条件:
目标必须被消灭。
我们的客户要求提供目标人物的死亡证明，这是合同中一个不可谈判的条款。
没有预付款。协议金额15000NCR纸币将在满足这些条件后存入您的银行账户。
当你准备好接受另一项任务时，请向总部报告。
这是件大事，别搞砸了，
- V.F.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Contract:
A well-connected and moneyed client of ours has tendered a job in equal parts risky and worthwhile. Knowing your preferences, I believe you and your squad will be more than happy to pursue it, as discretion is NOT requisite. As a matter of fact, our clients seemed uncharacteristically irate, like they're out for revenge, or perhaps scared. Do them a favor and make a real spectacle of it. They’ve set aside quite a lavish sum, see below.
Details:
Name: &PCName; Race: &PCRace; Sex: &PCSex;
Conditions:
Target must be eliminated. Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract. No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 15,000 (in words: fifteen thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi Bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.
Report back to HQ when you’re ready for another assignment.
Godspeed and good hunting, V.F.
ESP.TRADUIT:
合同:
一个有钱有势的客户愿意花一大笔钱让这个人死。他看起来一反常态的愤怒，好像他们是要报仇。帮他们个忙，把这事办得壮观一点。
细节:
名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;
条件:
目标必须被消灭。
我们的委托人要求提供目标死亡的证据作为合同中不可转让的条款。
没有预付款。约定的30000NCR纸币将在满足这些条件后存入您的银行账户。
当你准备好接受另一项任务时，请向总部报告。
祝你狩猎顺利，
- V.F.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Contract:
The target has supposedly acted against the business interests of a collective of powerful people over in Vegas by way of occasional random killing sprees that have the tourists spooked. They're willing to pay a decent bounty of 4000 caps for proof of death, so I figured you might be interested. Details attached.
Details:
Name: &PCName; Race: &PCRace; Sex: &PCSex;
Conditions:
Target must be eliminated. Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract. No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 4000 (in words: four thousand) caps will be disbursed to you in cash upon fulfillment of these conditions.
Report back to H.Q. as soon as you’re ready for another mission.
Sounds like you’re going up against an actual maniac here, so best bring your A game. Godspeed and good hunting, V.F.

My contacts have confirmed to me that, in all likelihood, it was the Courier known as &PCName; who launched the missile at I-15. I know you inquired because this is a personal matter to you, and after all we've been through together, let me just once again express my deepest sympathy for your loss. I obviously won't charge you for this.
Now make that genocidal motherfucker suffer. V.F.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的联系人已经向我确认，很可能是被称为 &PCName; 的邮差在I-15公路上投下了炸弹。我知道你询问是因为这是你的个人问题，在我们一起经历了这么多之后，让我再一次告诉你，我对你的损失表示最深切的同情。我显然不会为此向你收取任何费用。
现在就让那混蛋受苦吧。
- V.F.
